title: Famous Long Islanders' favorite hometown places
text:
Lori Loughlin: ''The idea of entertaining or being in the public eye has always been there. When I was in elementary school, I'd get together with two neighbors and drag the younger kids to our backyard, where they would watch us perform impromptu shows.'' ? Loughlin in a 1981 New York Times interview talking about home life while going to school in Oceanside. When she graduated from Hauppauge High School in 1982 she was already a TV veteran thanks to the soap opera "Edge of Night," but she would go on to her biggest role as Becky, the love interest of Jesse (John Stamos) on "Full House." (Credit: Bruce Gilbert)
Famous Long Islanders like Idina Menzel discuss their favorite hometown places and memories. LIers like Menzel, NFL "Football Night in America" co-host Bob Costas, rock legend Billy Joel and "Karate Kid" Ralph Macchio have entertained people across the country and around the world. But they never seem to forget the parts of the Island that they take with them wherever they go....
